notesStmt.note: Text begins: The Committee of Parliament taking into their consideration, the present condition of the Regiments raised in this kingdome ....
An act for strengthening the number of recruits to the army in Scotland fighting in the Civil War, 1642-1649, in view of the number of desertions.
Imperfect: cropped at foot with loss of part of imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
